SELECT t.commodityId,t.orderNumber,t.commodityNo,t.commodityName, t.unit,t.totalPrice totalPrice,t.addTime,t.commodityNum FROM t_order_detail t RIGHT JOIN t_order o ON t.orderNumber=o.orderNumber where 1=1 AND o.orderStatus!=1 AND o.status=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( t.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityName}),'%') OR t.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityName}),'%') OR t.orderNumber LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityName}),'%') )
ORDER BY t.addTime DESC
